backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the dental clinic backend, defining data types and CRUD operations for appointments, reviews, doctors, services, before/after gallery, user profiles, and clinic status, with authorization via access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (admin tooth-logo trigger, admin dashboard consolidation, frictionless booking dialog) to their affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-line descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and key details of every component, page, and hook in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes, including colors for background, foreground, primary, accent, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'XYZ Dental Clinic' and mounting the app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application file that configures TanStack Router with all page routes (home, service detail pages, admin pages) and wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider with a shared Header/Footer layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users to the access-denied page, showing a spinner while authentication and admin status are being resolved.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundPartic: Decorative fixed-position background component that renders 18 randomly positioned, animated SVG particles (tooth, plus, sparkle, circle shapes) with low opacity for a subtle dental theme effect.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: A draggable before/after image comparison slider component that supports mouse and touch events, displaying dental treatment pairs (orthodontics, whitening, smile makeover) with scroll reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/BookAppointmentD: A modal dialog form for booking dental appointments, collecting patient name, phone, service type, and preferred date, then submitting via a React Query mutation with validation and success state.
frontend/src/components/ClinicStatusBann: Displays a dismissible alert banner at the top of the page when the clinic status is 'closed' or 'emergency', fetched via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: A contact section displaying clinic phone, WhatsApp link, address, and hours alongside an embedded Google Maps iframe, with scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: A stub component that disables any custom cursor implementation and renders nothing, deferring to the native OS cursor.
frontend/src/components/DoctorProfile.ts: Renders a two-column doctor profile section with an image, bio, stats (experience, patients, success rate), and specialty tags for Dr. Priya Sharma, with scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDentalEl: Renders four floating dental icon images with CSS bob animations and scroll-based parallax offsets, positioned absolutely as non-interactive decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer with brand info, service links, contact details, a caffeine.ai attribution link, and a hidden tooth-logo button that opens an admin login modal.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with desktop/mobile navigation links, a 'Book Appointment' button that opens BookAppointmentDialog, and a hamburger menu for mobile viewports.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, scroll-reveal animation, headline text, and buttons to open the booking dialog or scroll to services.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminLogin: A dialog-based admin login form that validates hardcoded credentials and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminTrigg: An invisible fixed element in the bottom-right corner that opens the admin login modal on double-click or double-tap.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing loading state and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: A fixed 3px progress bar at the top of the viewport that fills based on the user's scroll position on the page.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of premium clickable service cards (with hover animations and scroll-reveal) and a row of standard service cards for the dental clinic.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialCarou: An auto-scrolling infinite carousel of patient testimonials, using backend-approved reviews when available and falling back to static testimonials.
frontend/src/components/TypewriterText.t: A component that animates text with a typewriter effect once the element becomes visible via scroll-reveal, with configurable speed and HTML tag.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, then saves it via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ZoomInImage.tsx: Image component that animates from scaled-down and transparent to full size when scrolled into view using the useScrollReveal hook.
frontend/src/context/CursorContext.tsx: React context that tracks and exposes a cursor icon state ('default' or 'dental') with a setter for global cursor customization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlassmorphismRevea: Hook that uses IntersectionObserver to set a visibility flag when an element enters the viewport, intended for glassmorphism reveal animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and exposing identity and status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized collection of React Query hooks for all backend interactions including appointments, clinic status, services, reviews, and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Generic hook that uses IntersectionObserver to toggle a visibility boolean when a referenced element scrolls into view, triggering once per element.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextScramble.ts: Hook that animates text with a randomized character scramble effect when the element enters the viewport, resolving to the target text over ~1 second.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining the OKLCH design token system, animated mesh gradient background, glassmorphism utilities, typography, and scroll reveal transition classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Full-page access denied screen with a shield icon and a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Appointments.ts: Admin page that lists all appointments with patient details, status badges, and buttons to confirm or cancel pending appointments using the updateAppointmentStatus mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BeforeAfterMana: Admin page for uploading before/after image pairs with drag-and-drop support, upload progress tracking, and a list of existing pairs fetched from the backend.
Admin page with a form to submit patient reviews (name, text, star rating) that are saved in a pending state awaiting approval before public display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx: Main admin dashboard showing clinic status controls (open/closed/emergency), a tabbed appointments table with status badges, and navigation links to other admin sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DoctorScheduler: Admin page for adding new doctors (name and specialty) and listing all existing doctors, using React Query hooks and toast notifications.
Admin page for moderating pending patient reviews, allowing admins to approve or delete each review with star ratings and optional photos.
Admin page for editing a fixed list of premium dental services, supporting display name, description, and featured photo upload with progress tracking.
Detail page for the Dental Implants service, featuring a hero section, benefits grid, and step-by-step process, all with scroll-reveal animations and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main home page that composes all major sections (hero, services, doctor profile, before/after slider, testimonials, contact) along with a clinic status banner and floating decorative elements.
frontend/src/pages/InvisalignDetail.tsx: Detail page for the Invisalign service, showcasing benefits, a before/after slider, and a CTA section with scroll-reveal animations and a booking dialog.
Detail page for Laser Dentistry, highlighting benefits and specific treatments with an animated laser-beam hero decoration, scroll-reveal sections, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PediatricDentistryDet: Detail page for Pediatric Dentistry, presenting child-friendly features and an early-habits section with scroll-reveal animations and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Generic service detail page that fetches service data by route param, displays a featured photo, description, and feature list, with a booking dialog and loading spinner.
frontend/src/pages/SmileMakeoverDetail.t: Detail page for the Smile Makeover service, featuring a hero section, list of included treatments, a before/after slider, and a booking CTA with scroll-reveal animations throughout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based semantic colors, teal/royal-blue palettes, custom fonts, glow shadows, and mesh-gradient/float animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 15) for a premium dental clinic website, documenting features, architectural notes, design decisions, known issues, and image requirements including GSAP animations, glassmorphism, admin panel, and appointment booking.
